ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron sighed again. She knew he needed no compassion, much less from her, but she had tried. His anger and hate for those who had wronged him was so great

From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Tavatron sighed again. She knew he needed no compassion, much less from her, 
but she had tried. His anger and hate for those who had wronged him was so 
great it frightened her.

She didn't understand why Dinobot had such anger toward his former comrades, 
but it was not her place to ask. She watched the mech-fluid drip to the 
floor, concern etched on her face. She frowned, such a pity. How could one 
so strong be so weak? Have such little control over his emotions? Tavatron 
sighed and walked over to Dinobot. She placed her hand on against his arm:

"I'm not tired. I'm going to get some food, come find me if you want to 
talk."

Tavatron walked out of the room and down the hall of the ark. She couldn't 
help being a little concerned. Showing compassion was something she had 
learned to do a long time ago. Before than an anger and hate had consumed 
her world. She had sworn she would never again lose control of herself. The 
cost was too great.
